import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { RadioButton } from 'primereact/radiobutton'; import { Button } from 'primereact/button'; function Answers(props) { const [answer, setAnswer] = useState(null); function Changed() { let ans = answer; if (ans == props.correctAnswer) { props.setCorrect(true); } else { props.setCorrect(false); } } return (

Correct answer is {props.correctAnswer}

{setAnswer(e.value); Changed();}} checked={answer === '3'}/>
